scripts.expo:android: export development=true && npm run sys:nvm && expo start --android
scripts.expo:ios: export development=true && npm run sys:nvm && expo start --ios
scripts.expo:web: export development=true && npm run sys:nvm && node -v && expo start --web
scripts.expo:web:ci: export development=true && npm run sys:nvm && expo start --web
scripts.expo:hybrid: export development=true && npm run sys:nvm &&  expo start --android --web
scripts.compile:ios: export $(grep '^[a-zA-Z_]*=.*' .env.production | xargs) && export SENTRY_LOG_LEVEL='debug' && expo build:ios && expo upload:ios
scripts.deploy:development: export $(grep '^[a-zA-Z_]*=.*' .env | xargs) && expo publish -c --release-channel development && npm run compile:web
scripts.deploy:production: export $(grep '^[a-zA-Z_]*=.*' .env | xargs) && expo publish && npm run compile:web
scripts.sys:bust: npm cache clean --force && rm -fr $TMPDIR/metro* && rm -rf node_modules/.cache/babel-loader/* && watchman watch-del-all && jest --clearCache || npm i -g jest && jest --clearCache || echo 'Failed to bust Jest, try manually'
scripts.sys:baseline: npm run sys:nvm && npm run sys:bust && rm package-lock.json && rm -rf node_modules && npm i
scripts.sys:nvm: nodever=$(<.nvmrc) && node -v | grep -q "v$nodever" && echo "Correct node version" && npm i || exit 1
scripts.sys:ncu:minor: npm run sys:nvm && ncu -u --target minor && npm i
scripts.sys:upgrade: npm run sys:nvm && ncu -u expo-cli && npm i && expo upgrade && npm i
scripts.test:all: npm run sys:nvm && npm run test:e2e:clear && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:e2e:dev: npm run sys:nvm && cypress open --config video=false
scripts.test:e2e: npm run sys:nvm && start-server-and-test 'npm run expo:web:ci' http://localhost:19006 'cypress run --browser chrome --quiet'
scripts.test:e2e:clear: start-server-and-test 'npm run expo:web' http://localhost:19006 'cypress run --config defaultCommandTimeout=30000,requestTimeout=30000 -q --spec cypress/integration/99-delete-account.js' || echo 'Not needed'
